line.originaltext: 1/2 cup butter, softened
1/2 cup brown sugar
3 bananas, mashed
1/4 cup milk
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
2 eggs
1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
1/2 cup wheat bran
1 teaspoon baking powder
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup chopped walnuts
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
line.annotation: set(t0,"preheat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)")

line.originaltext: Grease a muffin pan or line with paper muffin liners.
Grease a muffin pan or line with paper muffin liners.
line.annotation: set(t1,"grease or line with paper muffin liners")

line.originaltext: In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar together until fluffy.
In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar together until fluffy.
In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar together until fluffy.
line.annotation: mix(ing12, t2, ing13, "creamed butter and sugar", "cream together until fluffy")

line.originaltext: In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar together until fluffy.
Add bananas, milk, vanilla and eggs; mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing14, "mixed stuff", "")

line.originaltext: Add bananas, milk, vanilla and eggs; mix well.
Stir in flour, bran, baking powder, soda and salt; blend just until moistened.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing15, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing16, "batter", "")

line.originaltext: Stir in flour, bran, baking powder, soda and salt; blend just until moistened.
line.annotation: mix(ing16, t2, ing17, "blended batter", "blend just until moistened")

line.originaltext: Stir in walnuts.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing17}, ing18, "batter with walnuts", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Pour batter into prepared muffin cups.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
line.annotation: cook(ing18, t0, ing19, "baked muffins", "Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing19,"toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean")

line.originaltext: Cool in the cups for 5 minutes, then remove muffins and place on a wire rack to cool completely.
line.annotation: leave(ing19,"cool in the cups for 5 minutes")

line.originaltext: Cool in the cups for 5 minutes, then remove muffins and place on a wire rack to cool completely.
line.annotation: leave(ing19,"remove muffins and place on a wire rack to cool completely")
